text:
Ordered Tom Yum soup, hotplate tofu and other dishes for 3 people. After pay when order, we are told self collect the dishes to our table. Sizzling hot plate and hot soup. When questioned, the lady just walked away without answering. I'm shocked with their service. Never was like that. If only there was a minus star for their service.

They just lost another loyal customer.
Dine in at you own risk.

Halal Chinese tze char seafood style. Very very delicious. Better than most regular tze char stalls. Highly recommended. It's in a coffeeshop with nicer atmosphere. Cooling as well so it's a comfortable eating experience.

ordered item no.1 sliced fish with onion and ginger rice.

Waiting time was short as there wasn't much people. portion is normal.

Taste is pretty good with thick sauce. Rice was well cooked. Will visit again to try other items.

Update 11/09/2022:
Horfan is good! good amount of sotong and other ingredients.

Lalac seafood white beehoon is a disappointment.

Ordered fries kuay teow, hokkien mee and curry chicken rice. Only the curry chicken rice disappoint. Understand the comments about service but i think they are trying their best especially dealing w grab n foodpanda orders. Do give them a chance.
Tasty Wok is a chain of halal certified zi char (stir fry) stalls. Tried the chicken crispy noodles. Taste and portion size is ok.
